body:
This is ready. It's missing the routes to clone specific revisions, but revision stuff hasn't landed in `redesign` yet anyway. I think that'll end up being another PR.

Note @rehandalal I added a commit to this changing `SimpleLoadingOverlay`'s prop from `condition` to `visible`. To the world outside of the component, `condition` is pretty ambiguous, so I thought it made sense to switch it. BUT, this brings up the question that I don't think has been answered yet:

For React prop names, do we use `is`/`has` prefixes? Should we use
`<Whatever visible={false} />` or `<Whatever isVisible={false} />`?
